title: Emerald and Diamond Statement Haaram - Bridal Collection
materials: Platinum setting with 18K White Gold accents. Features round brilliant cut diamonds (FG color grade) and vibrant
pear-shaped Zambian Emeralds (16.55 carats). The diamond weight is approximately 83.67 carats. Hyderabadi Polish for enduring brilliance.
features: Exquisite floral and vine motifs are created using pave-set diamonds, framing the magnificent emeralds. The central cluster features a larger pear-shaped emerald, creating a focal point. The design showcases a modern take on the traditional Haaram, offering both elegance and statement appeal.
colors: the sparkling white diamonds provide a stunning contrast to the deep green emeralds. The platinum and white gold setting enhances the vibrancy of both gemstones.
occasions: Perfect for grand occasions like weddings (Vivahaalu)
and other significant celebrations. A standout piece for a contemporary bride embracing traditional aesthetics.
description: A breathtaking statement piece, this haaram showcases exceptional craftsmanship and the allure of natural emeralds. The platinum and white gold setting ensures lasting durability and a luxurious feel. The fusion of traditional design with modern elegance makes it a versatile investment.
